zakatPage.title: Zakat
zakatPage.description1: Easily calculate your annual zakat according to Islamic principles.
zakatPage.description2: Purify your wealth and help those in need.
zakatPage.noArchiveDesc1: Click the button above and calculate
zakatPage.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this zakat? This action cannot be undone.
zakatPage.toastCreateError: Unable to create zakat. Please try again.
zakatPage.takeWithYouDesc: Access all Amane+ features in one app. Make donations, track your returns, automate your Zakat and take part in solidarity actions, wherever you are.
zakatPage.quote1Text: A person's wealth never decreases when they pay Zakat
zakatPage.quote2Text: Whoever pays Zakat, Allah will increase their wealth.
zakatPage.quote3Text: The best charity is to pay Zakat on one's wealth
zakatPage.quote4Text: Zakat is a right that the poor have over the rich
zakatPage.quote5Text: Obligatory charity (Zakat) is more beloved to Allah than all charitable deeds done throughout the year.
zakatPage.quote6Text: Establish prayer and pay Zakat. Whatever good you send ahead for yourselves, you will find it with Allah.
zakatPage.quote7Text: O Muhammad, take from their wealth a charity that purifies them and causes them to prosper, and invoke blessings upon them. Your invocations are a source of comfort for them. Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

zakatCalculatorModal.title: Calculate my Zakat
zakatCalculatorModal.subtitle: Calculate and archive your annual obligations
zakatCalculatorModal.infoCash: Zakat is due at 2.5% on cash and bank holdings held for a full year.
zakatCalculatorModal.infoOr: Zakat is due at 2.5% of the market value at the valuation date.
zakatCalculatorModal.infoArgentMetal: Zakat is due at 2.5% on all items made of pure silver, including jewellery, decorative objects, silverware, etc.
zakatCalculatorModal.infoPierres: If they have a market value, precious stones count towards your wealth on which Zakat is due.
zakatCalculatorModal.agricultureNote: The 2.5% rate does not apply to these fields. Rate depends on irrigation type:
zakatCalculatorModal.includesAgriculture: Includes agricultural Zakat (10% / 5% / 7.5%); the 2.5% rate does not apply to agriculture fields.
zakatCalculatorModal.infoNissab: Nissab is the minimum threshold of wealth (savings, assets you own) above which Zakat Al Maal is obligatory. If your wealth exceeds the Nissab for a full year, you must pay 2.5% of your resources.
zakatCalculatorModal.agricultureOnlyMessage: Only your agricultural Zakat can be recorded, as your other assets ({total} F CFA) are below the Nissab threshold ({nissab} F CFA).
zakatCalculatorModal.agricultureOnlyNote: The agricultural Zakat ({amount} F CFA) will be saved. For the 2.5% to apply to your other assets, your wealth excluding agriculture must exceed the Nissab.
zakatCalculatorModal.belowNissabMessage: The total value of your assets is not Zakatable because it is below the Nissab.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo1Item1: Zakat is due at 2.5% on cash and bank holdings held for a full year.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo1Item2: Gold: 2.5% of market value at the valuation date.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo1Item3: Silver (metal): 2.5% on all items made of pure silver (jewellery, tableware, etc.).
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo1Item4: Precious stones: if they have market value, they are included in the Zakat base.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo2InvestText: Zakat must be paid either directly by the company or individually by each owner in proportion to their share in the company's capital at the last balance sheet date. The individual must then estimate their share of profit at the time of Zakat calculation.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo2ImmoText: Zakat is not due on real estate used as your primary or secondary residence. Zakat is also not due on the value of rental properties but only on the rental income you receive, after deducting maintenance costs. If your real estate investment is intended for future resale for profit, Zakat is then due on the market value of that property.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo2OthersText: You must pay Zakat on the amount of loans you have granted to others, as with cash. You may deduct loans you have received and not yet repaid. Zakat is not due on doubtful receivables (loans you are not sure will be repaid); in that case Zakat becomes due when the money is repaid to you.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo3AgriText: Zakat is due on all agricultural produce (fruits, vegetables, flowers, grains, etc.) grown for commercial purposes at harvest time, for a total quantity of at least 653 kg. The one-year holding period does not apply to agricultural produce, and Zakat must be paid for each harvest. The agreed formula is: 10% for crops from non-irrigated land (rain only); 5% for irrigated land without rain; and 7.5% for mixed situations.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo3BetailText: For all grazing animals (goats, sheep, camels, cattle, etc.) the agreed rule is that Zakat due equals one animal per 40. You may however pay in cash; we encourage you to consult your imam or scholars for more information on this option.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo4Text: If you have taxes to pay to the government at the Zakat calculation date, you may deduct them before arriving at net value. If you have taken a loan from a person or institution and have not already deducted it in one of the sections above, you may deduct your debts here. Be honest, as Zakat is a sure way to protect your wealth when paid regularly and in full. Loans taken only for Zakatable wealth should be deducted. Cars, houses, etc. are not Zakatable assets, so any loan or mortgage taken for these purposes should not be deducted.
zakatCalculatorModal.stepInfo5Text: If you have taxes to pay to the government at the Zakat calculation date, you may deduct them before arriving at net value. If you have taken a loan from a person or institution and have not already deducted it in one of the sections above, you may deduct your debts here. Be honest, as Zakat is a sure way to protect your wealth when paid regularly and in full. Loans taken only for Zakatable wealth should be deducted. Cars, houses, etc. are not Zakatable assets, so any loan or mortgage taken for these purposes should not be deducted.

profil.termesContent:
By using the Amane+ platform, you agree to comply with the following terms of use:

1. Use of the platform
   - You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
   - You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account
   - You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information

2. Transactions
   - All transactions are final and non-refundable, except in exceptional cases
   - Transaction fees may apply depending on the payment method
   - We reserve the right to refuse any suspicious transaction

3. Behaviour
   - You agree to use the platform in a legal and ethical manner
   - Any fraudulent activity will result in the immediate suspension of your account
   - Respect for the community is essential
profil.aideSupportFaqTitle: Simple answers to the most common questions.
profil.aideSupportContactTitle: Get in touch with our support team.
profil.aideSupportAddress:
COCODY CORNICHE
Rue B5, La Villa Nova
Abidjan, CÃ”TE D'IVOIRE
profil.aideSupportQ1: How do I make a donation?
profil.aideSupportA1: To make a donation, go to the "Donations" section in the main menu, choose your project or cause, then follow the instructions to complete your donation. You can pay by card, mobile money or Amane+ wallet.
profil.aideSupportQ2: How do I calculate my Zakat?
profil.aideSupportA2: Our Zakat calculator guides you step by step. Go to the "Zakat" section, enter your financial information (savings, gold, silver, etc.), and our system will automatically calculate your Zakat amount (generally 2.5% of your eligible assets).
profil.aideSupportQ3: How do I enable dark mode?
profil.aideSupportA3: Dark mode is enabled by default on Amane+. If you want to disable or change it, go to your profile Settings, then to the Preferences section. You can choose between dark and light theme.
profil.aideSupportQ4: How do I contact customer service?
profil.aideSupportA4: You can contact us by email at amane.plus@email.com, by WhatsApp at +225 05 74 86 12 94, or by phone at +225 27 22 22 15 99. Our team is available to help you Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm.
profil.aProposA1: Amane+ is an innovative platform that facilitates acts of charity and strengthens community ties through modern technology, while respecting Islamic values. We offer a complete solution for donations, Zakat, Takaful and other forms of charity, making generosity accessible, transparent and impactful for all.
profil.aProposA2: Our mission is to make generosity accessible, transparent and impactful for all. We facilitate donations, Zakat, Takaful and other forms of charity by using technology to create a bridge between donors and those in need. We believe that every act of generosity, no matter how small, can create a significant positive impact in the community.
profil.aProposA3:
Amane+ offers a full range of charity services:

â€¢ Donations: Contribute to projects and causes you care about
â€¢ Zakat: Calculate and pay your Zakat easily with our calculator
â€¢ Takaful: Subscribe to Sharia-compliant mutual insurance
â€¢ Investments: Invest in ethical and sustainable projects
â€¢ Savings: Save while contributing to charitable causes

All our services are designed to be transparent, secure and compliant with Islamic principles.
profil.aProposA4:
Since our launch, Amane+ has:

â€¢ Collected over 2.5 million XOF in donations
â€¢ Funded over 150 community projects
â€¢ Brought together a community of over 50,000 active users
â€¢ Served 15 countries across West Africa

Every transaction on our platform directly contributes to improving the lives of those in need, while strengthening community ties and promoting values of solidarity and mutual support.
profil.aProposA5: Amane+ is a team of passionate professionals dedicated to creating a positive impact in the community. We combine technological expertise, knowledge of Islamic principles and a commitment to transparency to offer a trusted platform. Our vision is to become the reference for digital charity in the Muslim world, creating an ecosystem where every act of generosity helps build a better future for all.

intro.title: Need help? We're here for you!
intro.description: If you're going through a difficult situation, Amane+ allows you to submit a confidential help request. Each request is treated with seriousness, respect and transparency.
intro.trustDesc: Your information is protected and used only to process your request.

form.shariahMasakin: Al Masakin (Needy: insufficient income for basic needs)
form.shariahGharimin: Al Gharimin (In debt: health or survival debts only)
form.acceptPhoto: For transparency, would the applicant agree to have their photo taken?
form.healthLifeThreatening: Is this a life-threatening emergency (critical within 24-48h)?
form.patientCmuCard: Does the patient have a CMU card? (patientHaveCmuCard)

hero.subtitle: The all-in-one Islamic platform for donations, zakat, takaful and halal investments.

spirituality.title: Live spirituality in the digital age
spirituality.description: Amane+ is an innovative technology solution that lets you live your religious values fully in the modern world. Our platform combines Islamic tradition with the latest technology to offer you an ethical, transparent and accessible financial experience. Whether you want to donate, calculate your zakat, invest in a halal way or protect yourself with Takaful, Amane+ supports you at every step of your spiritual financial journey.

ethicalWallet.title: An ethical wallet
ethicalWallet.description: Manage all your ethical financial services from a single platform. Donations, zakat, halal investments, savings and Takaful protection â€“ everything is just a few clicks away. Our ethical wallet lets you track all your transactions, see your impact and meet your religious obligations with ease.

donations.title: Donations & Solidarity
donations.description: Make one-off or recurring donations to verified campaigns: health, education, clean water, food aid, orphans, and more.
donations.quote: The Prophet ï·º said: "Charity never decreases wealth." (Muslim)
donations.trace: Every gesture is tracked through to its final impact.

zakat.title: Automated Zakat
zakat.description: Calculate and distribute your zakat easily with our automated system. Our smart calculator follows all Islamic principles and guides you step by step. You can then distribute your zakat to verified causes and track the impact of your contribution.

takaful.title: Takaful (Islamic Insurance)
takaful.description: Contribute to a mutual fund to support members in times of need â€” no interest, no speculation.
takaful.quote: The Prophet ï·º said: "Believers, in their love, mercy and compassion for one another, are like one body." (Bukhari and Muslim)
takaful.community: A community that insures one another in a spirit of sharing.

invest.quote: The Prophet ï·º said: "Seek what is lawful, for Allah only accepts what is lawful." (Tabarani)
invest.tagline: Invest with no compromise, in line with your values.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Simple answers to the most common questions about Amane+
faq.item0Question: How do I make a donation?
faq.item0Answer: To make a donation, go to the "Donations" or "Campaigns" section in the main menu, choose your project or cause, then follow the instructions to complete your donation. You can pay by card, mobile money or Amane+ wallet.
faq.item1Question: How do I calculate my Zakat?
faq.item1Answer: Our Zakat calculator guides you step by step. Go to the "Zakat" section, enter your financial information (savings, gold, silver, etc.), and our system will automatically calculate your Zakat amount (generally 2.5% of your eligible assets).
faq.item2Answer: Takaful is a solidarity-based insurance compliant with Islamic finance principles. Participants pool their contributions to protect each other, with no interest (riba) and transparent management of funds.
faq.item3Question: How do I invest with Amane+?
faq.item3Answer: Go to the "Invest" section to discover available halal investment projects. After creating your account and verification, you can choose a project and participate according to the terms indicated.
faq.item4Question: How do I contact customer service?
faq.item4Answer: You can contact us by email at contact@amane-plus.com, by phone at +225 27 22 49 89 00, or via the form on our Contact page. Our team is available to help you.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer all your questions and support you on your journey with Amane+
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.errorGeneric: Unable to send the message. Check your connection or try again later.
contact.address: Head office: Abidjan-Cocody, La Villa Nova Rue B5, Corniche

confidentialite.title: Privacy policy
confidentialite.subtitle: How Amane+ collects, uses and protects your personal data
confidentialite.section1Content: We collect the information you provide when registering and using our services: identity, contact details, transaction and investment data, in compliance with the purposes of the service and applicable regulations.
confidentialite.section2Content: Your data is used to manage your account, execute your operations (donations, Zakat, Takaful, investments), send you the information necessary for the service, improve our platform and comply with our legal and regulatory obligations.
confidentialite.section3Content: We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your data against unauthorised access, loss or alteration, in accordance with best practices and applicable regulations.
confidentialite.section4Content: You have the right to access, rectify, limit processing and, where provided by law, object to and request deletion of your data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us or via your profile area.
confidentialite.section5Content: For any questions regarding this policy or your personal data, contact us at: contact@amane-plus.com or via the
confidentialite.lastUpdate: Last updated: February 2025. Amane+ reserves the right to adapt this policy; significant changes will be communicated to you.

termesConditions.title: Terms and conditions
termesConditions.subtitle: Terms of use of the Amane+ platform
termesConditions.section1Content: These terms of use govern access to and use of the Amane+ platform, its services (donations, Zakat, Takaful, investments) and content. By creating an account or using our services, you accept these terms without reservation.
termesConditions.section2Content: Amane+ offers participatory and ethical finance services compliant with Islamic finance principles: collection and disbursement of donations and Zakat, subscription to Takaful products, and participation in halal investment projects. Access to certain services may be subject to registration and identity verification.
termesConditions.section3Content: You agree to provide accurate information and to maintain the confidentiality of your login details. You are responsible for activities carried out from your account. Amane+ reserves the right to suspend or close an account in the event of breach of these terms or applicable regulations.
termesConditions.section4Content: Operations carried out on the platform (donations, payments, subscriptions, investments) are your responsibility. Amane+ strives to ensure the availability and security of the service but cannot be held liable for indirect damages, service interruptions or the acts of third parties. Investments carry a risk of capital loss.
termesConditions.section5Content: All elements of the platform (texts, visuals, brands, software) are protected by intellectual property law. Any unauthorised reproduction or use is prohibited without prior agreement from Amane+.
termesConditions.section6Content: Amane+ may modify these terms. Users will be informed of significant changes; continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms. The terms are governed by the law applicable at Amane+'s registered office; any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts.
termesConditions.section7Content: For any questions regarding these terms: contact@amane-plus.com or via the

protectionEnfants.title: Child Protection Standards â€“ AMANE+
protectionEnfants.subtitle: Effective date: 1 February 2026 Â· AMANE+
protectionEnfants.section1Intro: The AMANE+ application applies a zero-tolerance policy regarding any form of child sexual abuse and exploitation (CSAE).
protectionEnfants.section1Item2: Any form of solicitation or grooming of minors
protectionEnfants.section1Item4: Distribution of sexualised content involving minors
protectionEnfants.section1Item5: Any behaviour endangering the safety of a child
protectionEnfants.section1Outro: Child protection is an absolute priority for AMANE+.
protectionEnfants.section2Intro: On AMANE+, it is strictly prohibited to:
protectionEnfants.section2Item1: Publish, share or store content involving the exploitation of a minor
protectionEnfants.section2Item2: Contact a minor for inappropriate purposes
protectionEnfants.section2Item3: Encourage or facilitate illegal activities involving children
protectionEnfants.section2Item4: Use the platform to harass or manipulate a minor
protectionEnfants.section2Outro: Any violation results in immediate sanctions, including permanent account deletion.
protectionEnfants.section3Intro: AMANE+ provides a clear and accessible system for reporting:
protectionEnfants.section3Item3: An attempted exploitation involving a minor
protectionEnfants.section3Paragraph1: Users can report directly within the application.
protectionEnfants.section3Paragraph2: A report can also be sent to our security team at:
protectionEnfants.section3Paragraph3: Each report is taken seriously and processed as soon as possible.
protectionEnfants.section4Item3: Immediate suspension of accounts in case of violation
protectionEnfants.section4Item4: Permanent exclusion in case of serious offence
protectionEnfants.section4Intro2: In case of credible elements related to CSAE, AMANE+ may:
protectionEnfants.section4Item2_1: Immediately remove the content in question
protectionEnfants.section4Item2_2: Suspend or delete the user account
protectionEnfants.section4Item2_3: Retain evidence in accordance with the law
protectionEnfants.section4Item2_4: Report the facts to the competent authorities
protectionEnfants.section5Content1: AMANE+ is not intended for children under 13 (or the minimum age required by local legislation).
protectionEnfants.section5Content2: If we find that a user does not meet the age requirements, immediate action will be taken.
protectionEnfants.section6Content1: AMANE+ fully cooperates with the competent authorities and child protection bodies in case of suspected abuse or exploitation.
protectionEnfants.section6Content2: We comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding the protection of minors.
protectionEnfants.section7Content: These standards may be updated at any time to strengthen user safety and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and Google Play standards.
